Sure, but you'll have to let me know what you want done with it.

----- Original Message -----
From: "dph_of_rules" <dph_of_rules@...>
To: <gladiator@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Friday, June 21, 2002 12:20 PM
Subject: [gladiator] Re: Gladiator source


> --- In gladiator@y..., Kyle Gray <bladetek@s...> wrote:
> > Hey all, I'm new to this group, but I've been a fan of Gladiator for
> several years now. I'm not a C++ programmer (Only VB), so I can't help
> in that section, but I'm pretty good at drawing graphics and the like,
> so if there is anything that could use drawing, gimmie a ring.
>
> Alright, another VB programmer.  I am working off and on on a scenario
> editor in VB.  I have most of the functionality worked out (add
> objects, deleting objects, modifying objects), but I just haven't put
> together the means of selection.  Right now, the only way I can do
> that is by going inside my code and manually putting that in.  Would
> you like me to email you all that I have put together for my scenario
> editor?
>
>
>
> The Gladiator Mailing List
>
>
> Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
>
>
